data.name: About1SectionText1
data.value: high quality, innovative industrial solutions across various sectors such as Nuclear, Power, Oil & Gas, Marine, MOD, Offshore and Petrochemical. The company was formed in 2012 on the initiative of

data.name: About1SectionText3
data.value: a market leader in providing world-class, multi-disciplinary industrial solutions.Our combination of experience, technical expertise, commercial capabilities and determination to deliver, enable our clients to grow and prosper.

data.name: About1SectionText4
data.value: We have an exceptional track record in successfully managing complex projects within short time-frames and are keenly focused on performance in all our dealings. Our team of leading experts ensure that deadlines are met and projects are delivered to the highest standard.

data.name: About1SectionText5
data.value: is a 50% Kazakh Company and employs a 97% Kazakh workforce, with approximately 1,000 employees, working on a range of projects. Our philosophy is to constantly strive to increase and develop our local team through recruitment, employee development, training, technology transfer and investment.

data.name: About2SectionText1
data.value: is committed to increasing local team and to promoting nationalisation in all the regions in which we operate. We have consistently demonstrated such a commitment in Kazakhstan, to our people, our clients and our partners.

data.name: About2SectionText2
data.value: There are three main target areas of our Kazakhstani content program (KCP):

data.name: About2SectionText3
data.value: Maximization of employment of national personnel

data.name: About2SectionText4
data.value: Training and development of national personnel

data.name: About2SectionText5
data.value: Utilization of local suppliers, subcontractors and partners

data.name: About3SectionText1
data.value: Our vision is to be a recognized leading supplier of oilfield services in our chosen markets. To achieve this, we will:

data.name: About3SectionText2
data.value: Strive to attract and retain the best people

data.name: About3SectionText3
data.value: Use our best endeavours to keep them safe

data.name: About3SectionText4
data.value: Seek to provide services that are market leading

data.name: About3SectionText5
data.value: Endeavour to exceed our customers' expectations

data.name: AboutBannerText
data.value: Innovative and Reliable Industrial Solutions Delivered Safely by Our Highly Skilled Workforce

data.name: AboutFounder1
data.value: Kassym Abzhanov, Founder, Member of the Board of Directors

data.name: AboutFounder2
data.value: Russel Best, Member of the Board of Directors

data.name: AboutReview1Text1
data.value: DSL Caspian are sub-contractor of ErSai Caspian Contractors for Surface preparation, Painting, Rope Access, Insulation and Passive fire Protection within our Kuryk, Karabatan, an Kashagan projects.

data.name: AboutReview1Text2
data.value: As a representative of the company procurement, contacts department we would have no hesitation to recommend DSL Caspian for industrial services projects.

data.name: AboutReview2Text1
data.value: We are all well aware of your personal contributions to the Kashagan project.

data.name: AboutReview2Text2
data.value: This project has it's own complex problems, but with your teams attention to detail and relentless determination to release a quality product on time, it is made our job much easier.

data.name: AboutReview2Text3
data.value: We proud to have you as part of our team and look forward to your future contribution.

data.name: AboutReview3Text1
data.value: Startup and Operate Offshore Department would like to express it's graditude to DSL Caspian for adopting the correct attitude and performance, with regard to Health Safety and Enviroment (HSE) activities,during the Due Diligence Project.

data.name: AboutReview3Text2
data.value: DSL Caspian employees have been following HSE rules abd contributing in overall D Island HSE perfomance

data.name: AboutReview4Text1
data.value: I would confirm DSL Caspian is currently a sub-contractor of PSNK for Surface preparation, Painting, Rope Access, Insulation and Passive Fire Protection, for our Karabatan and Kashagan projects.

data.name: AboutReview4Text2
data.value: Based on DSL's performance to date, I would have no hesitation to consider DSL Caspian for future industrial services projects

data.name: AboutReview5Text1
data.value: DSL Caspian, in regard to the excellent job you and your staff have done over the past several months, in relation to the insulation repair programm, for Maintenance, held Offshore on the Kashagan Project.

data.name: AboutReview5Text2
data.value: It was quite undertaking but it all went smoothly and efficiently, thanks the whole teams positive attitude, HSE record and on producing a quality and professional job.

data.name: AboutReview5Text3
data.value: You and your team should take great pride in this achievement.

data.name: CareerBannerText
data.value: We strive to increase and develop our local team in all regions in which we operate.

data.name: CareerMainTitle
data.value: We Need Your Skill in Our Team

data.name: CareerSection1Text1
data.value: policy is to focus on hiring local Kazakh engineering, management and craft personnel. Our focus for developing and growing the company is to recruit, train and develop local personnel using the following strategies:

data.name: CareerSection1Text1Li1
data.value: Increase the number of national citizens employed by DSL Caspian.

data.name: CareerSection1Text1Li2
data.value: Actively source qualified and skilled national employees

data.name: CareerSection1Text1Li3
data.value: Develop our own personnel through on-going, training and mentoring, and arranging specialist training courses overseas, where appropriate

data.name: CareerSection1Text1Li4
data.value: Collaborate with local educational institutions to employ qualified graduates

data.name: CareerSection1Text1Li5
data.value: Work together with our Clients to organise training for our people working on client’s sites

data.name: CareerSection1Text1Li6
data.value: Provide funds and resources for education and training of local citizens

data.name: Clean1SectionText1
data.value: provides onshore and offshore cleaning and decontamination services, supporting blue-chip clients based principally in the oil and gas, petrochemical, heavy industry, manufacturing and pharmaceutical sectors. We use a wide range of safe Industrial Cleaning techniques such as: high pressure water jetting, high airflow vacuum services and chemical decontamination processes.

data.name: Clean1SectionText2
data.value: We undertake industrial cleaning works daily on heavy industrial sites across the country. We understand the importance of this discipline in relation to safety, preventative maintenance, equipment life expectancy and the general health and wellbeing of our teams and operatives.

data.name: Clean1SectionTextLi6
data.value: Removing and transferring wet or dry materials

data.name: Clean1SectionTextLi7
data.value: Removing heavy sludge, silt or other viscous materials from great depth or long distances

data.name: CleanBannerText
data.value: We provide a wide range of industrial cleaning and decontamination services.

data.name: FP1SectionText1
data.value: hydrocarbon fire protection systems operate on structural steelwork, vessels, tanks and spheres for either new construction or maintenance works for power stations, nuclear power, petrochemical, oil & gas and pharmaceutical sites.

data.name: FP1SectionText2
data.value: A variety of fire protection services are available including fire seals and general penetration work utilising a variety of industry standard materials and specifications. We are licensed for the Promat Fendolite, International Chartek, PPG Pitt- Char , Leigh’s M90 Systems, and Jota-Char.

data.name: FPBannerText
data.value: Our team has a proven track record in hydrocarbon fire protection on oil & gas sites.

data.name: HomeTextCarouselTitle2
data.value: DSL Caspian is ready to help

data.name: HomeWelcomeText
data.value: We provide essential fabric maintenance and construction support to the oil and gas industry in the Caspian region offering high-quality services in access solutions including rope access, insulation, refractory linings, industrial coatings, passive fire protection, blasting, industrial cleaning, training and assessment throughout the lifecycle of large secure industrial assets.

data.name: Insl1SectionText1
data.value: As a long-established member of the Thermal Insulation Contractors Association (TICA), we have gained extensive knowledge and expertise providing insulation over many years. While covering the full spectrum of thermal, cryogenic and acoustic insulation and applications, great importance is placed on maintaining and developing strong technical and commercial links with primary manufacturers and suppliers.

data.name: Insl1SectionText2
data.value: We continually review new products and applications to improve quality, cost-effectiveness, and alternative methods of installation. Cladding materials such as stainless steel, aludip, aluzinc, galvanised mild steel and alternative finishes including PIB, canvas and glass cloths are also available.

data.name: InslBannerText
data.value: We offer a full range of insulation applications, including mineral fibres, cellular glass, calcium silicate, polyurethane and phenolic foams.

data.name: PC1SectionText1
data.value: specialises in applying protective coatings for industrial clients, particularly on long-term maintenance contracts and large construction sites. Work is also carried out on demanding decorative painting projects where our technical expertise and ability to get things right first time, provide our customers with the service they need.

data.name: PCBannerText
data.value: We specialize in applying protective coatings for industrial clients

data.name: Proc1SectionText1
data.value: Distribution and Sales is an independent specialized supplier of industrial products to Kazakhstan Oil and Gas, Petrochemical and Construction Market.

data.name: Proc1SectionText2
data.value: With extensive product knowledge and expertise we offer innovative and cost-effective solutions to our customers. We aim to create a division which will provide fully integrated technical and procurement service to cover all of DSL Caspian project trade requirements. Through combination of technical solution of projects (estimating, operations, business development) and procurement solution of projects (distribution and sales, business development, estimating)

data.name: Proc1SectionText3
data.value: DSL Caspian Distribution and Sales will become “the one-stop-shop for the industrial contractor”.

data.name: Proc2SectionText
data.value: Our product distribution list features world’s leading specialist service providers such as Paroc Group, Sealumet Group, Inspired Noise UK, First Trace Heating Direct, Thermobile Industries and XIOM Energy Services.

data.name: Proc3SectionSideText1
data.value: Understanding our customers demand, offering efficient solutions and commitment to high quality standards make us a reliable partner who looks to expand our supply capabilities.

data.name: Proc3SectionSideText11
data.value: Contact our Distribution and Sales team to enquire about our products and partnership opportunities.

data.name: ProcBannerText
data.value: We are a leading independent specialized supplier of industrial products to Kazakhstan

data.name: ProcBoxesTextMain
data.value: We supply a wide range of products and equipment including insulation, protective coatings, heating equipment, access solutions.

data.name: ProjectsBannerText
data.value: Growing our portfolio of satisfied long-term international customers

data.name: ProjectsPortfolioMaersk3
data.value: provision of manpower, material and scaffolding services at Dunga Oil field area.

data.name: Rope1SectionText
data.value: Our highly-skilled teams ensure safety is paramount. DSL Caspian has successfully completed projects both on – and offshore in Karabatan and Kachagan. We have in-house IRATA level “3” supervision, and level “1” operatives. DSL Caspian are planning to introduce an additional NDT service in the near future.

data.name: RopeBannerText
data.value: We have developed unrivalled expertise in rope access and abseiling techniques both on and offshore.

data.name: Scaffolding1SectionText1
data.value: We hold an extensive stock of wholly-owned equipment, including Layher System Scaffold, which allows us to undertake projects of any size. This technically advanced system allows for significant productivity gains over tube and fitting scaffolds and other systems scaffolds such as Cuplok. This system has enhanced safety through the use of purpose designed components, made to fit around irregular shapes and profiles. This system requires no ledger bracing providing the greatest possible access to work faces and allows to make speedy modifications to structures with no loose components.

data.name: Scaffolding1SectionText2
data.value: can also service projects with traditional tube and fitting, and standard modular scaffolding to suit clients’ needs.

data.name: ScaffoldingBannerText
data.value: Our fully-trained workforce provides access solutions, using Layher System Scaffold as well as traditional tube and fitting.

data.name: ServicesBannerText1
data.value: With over 40 years of knowledge and experience

data.name: ServicesBannerText2
data.value: we undertake projects of any size

data.name: ServicesSection1Text
data.value: As your strategic partner, we have the ability to mobilise and ramp up rapidly and effectively, which allows us to undertake projects of any size. Through our highly-experienced management team and highly-skilled workforce we are able to offer innovative cost effective industrial solutions for customers. Through introducing smart technologies to traditional industries, we streamline processes, provide real-time information and make work more efficient.

data.name: SHEQBannerText
data.value: Strongly committed to health and safety and the well-being in the workplace

data.name: SHEQSection1Subtitle1
data.value: Ensure our team’s awareness of the importance of Environmental Protection

data.name: SHEQSection1Subtitle2
data.value: Responsibly manage chemical substances and preparations

data.name: SHEQSection1Subtitle3
data.value: Be a model of environmental responsibility

data.name: SHEQSection1Text1
data.value: Whether it’s dealing with volatile substances or working in potentially hazardous environments, our highly skilled teams ensure safety is paramount. We continually review our SHEQ strategies and constantly look for new innovative ideas to improve our management system. We constantly review our HSEQ strategies to ensure that we can deliver our services ‘right first time’, ensuring that everybody who works for and with us, goes home safe every day.

data.name: SHEQSection1Text2
data.value: In accordance with our commitment to a responsible environmental policy and our objectives DSL Caspian will:

data.name: SHEQSection1Text3
data.value: Our people are trained to understand that protection of the environment is everybody’s responsibility. This on-going training enables them to make the right decisions when it comes to ensuring safety and environmental protection.

data.name: SHEQSection1Text4
data.value: DSL Caspian strives for optimum safety with respect to the handling and storage of chemicals. This includes the search for newer and safer products to replace existing technologies. With over 50 years’ experience, we aim to get things ‘right first time’, providing the trust, reliability and service our customers need.

data.name: SHEQSection1Text5
data.value: DSL Caspian takes our commitment to environmental responsibility seriously. We comply with all requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan, as well as ISO 14001, the international standards in the field of environmental protection.

data.name: SHEQSection2Text1
data.value: As part of its social sustainability program, DSL Caspian participates in various social events and activities in the region.

data.name: SHEQSection2Text2
data.value: provided sponsorship to the Second Annual Marathon of Atyrau held on the 13 May 2017. DSL Caspian supports Annual Marathon for the second year.

data.name: SHEQSection2Text3
data.value: For more information about the event please proceed the following link

data.name: Train1SectionText1
data.value: Certified by the Committee of Industrial Development and Industrial Safety since 28 April, 2017,

data.name: Train1SectionText2
data.value: provides the following training courses required in Kazakhstan:

data.name: Train1SectionTextLi8
data.value: Safe operation of vessels under pressure

data.name: Train2SectionText1
data.value: Familiarize personnel of the company (client) with Kazakhstan Labour Code and principal legal regulations in the sphere of labour.

data.name: Train2SectionText2
data.value: Know safety and labour protection regulation requirements in Kazakhstan

data.name: Train2SectionTextLi2
data.value: Fundamentals of Safety and Labour Protection in the Organization

data.name: Train2SectionTextLi3

data.name: Train2SectionTextLi4
data.value: Social Protection of the Personal Aggrieved through Industrial Accidents

data.value: Familiarize employees with main industrial safety rules on hazardous facilities

data.name: Train3SectionText2
data.value: Obtain principal theoretical knowledge in the field of industrial safety

data.name: Train3SectionText3
data.value: To know the rules of safe performance of works on hazardous industrial facilities

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi12
data.value: Investigation and accounting of incidents, accidents on hazardous industrial facilities

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi13
data.value: Training, retraining of specialists, employees of hazardous industrial facilities

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi2
data.value: Obligations of organizations in the scope of civil protection

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi3
data.value: Obligations of individuals in the scope of civil protection

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi4

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi6

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi8
data.value: Issuance of permits for hazardous materials

data.name: Train3SectionTextLi9
data.value: Registration and deregistrtion of hazardous technical equipment

data.name: Train4SectionText1
data.value: This course in safe working at height is designed to reduce the risk of personnel injury and to prevent personnel and materials form fall.

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li1
data.value: Identify potential hazards associated with working at height

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li2
data.value: Know the purpose and types of the personal fall protection systems (PFPS)

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li3
data.value: Get practical skills in the application of personal protection system

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li4
data.value: Know how to work at height in safe manner and to prevent workers falling and injuring

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li5
data.value: Know the requirements for safe work on scaffolding, staircases and ladders, on elevating work platforms

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li6
data.value: Know the potential hazards and control the objects fall

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li7
data.value: Know which authorization documents are required for work at height

data.name: Train4SectionText2Li8
data.value: Know the roles and responsibilities of persons involved in working at height

data.name: Train5SectionText
data.value: Train personnel on the requirements for safe operations involving confined space entry

data.name: Train5SectionText1Li1
data.value: Know what operations are covered by confined space entry requirements

data.name: Train5SectionText1Li2
data.value: Know site preparation requirements to control hazards

data.name: Train5SectionText1Li3
data.value: Identify general hazards associated with space entry

data.name: Train5SectionText1Li4
data.value: Know how to perform confined space entry activities in a safe & controlled manner

data.name: Train5SectionText1Li5
data.value: Know roles and responsibilities of personnel directly involved in confined space entry activities

data.name: Train5SectionText2Li3
data.value: Potential hazards associated with the confined space entry

data.name: Train5SectionText2Li6
data.value: Roles & responsibilities of personnel authorized for confined space entry

data.name: Train6SectionText
data.value: Make supervisors, specialists and company personnel aware of the fire safety fundamentals

data.name: Train6SectionText1Li1
data.value: Acquire basic theoretical knowledge in fire safety

data.name: Train6SectionText1Li2
data.value: Obtain skills and knowledge so as act in case of emergency

data.name: Train6SectionText2Li1
data.value: General information on burning and fire-explosion hazardous properties of substances and materials, fire hazards in buildings

data.name: Train6SectionText2Li3
data.value: Fire safety precautions when performing fire hazardous works and storing substances and materials

data.name: Train6SectionText2Li4
data.value: Characteristics of the fire danger during hot works at fire and explosion dangerous facilities

data.name: Train6SectionText2Li5
data.value: Fire safety requirements to evacuation routes

data.name: Train6SectionText2Li6

data.name: Train6SectionText2Li7

data.name: TrainBannerText1
data.value: Our training department is certified to provide qualification courses and in-house training

data.name: SHEQnewsIOSH
data.value: We are proud to say that we have trained another 25 of our DSL Caspian team (2 courses were conducted) in IOSH Managing Safely in March 2018, the training was done by Neill Moffat, SHEQ Director, Actavo (CMIOSH, FIIRSM), supported by Vladislav Sharafiyev, QC Manager, who interpreted to the team in Russian and Kazakh to ensure all got a deeper understanding of the course and tools in their own language so that they can now manage safely.

data.name: SHEQnewsIOSH2
data.value: In addition, Jon Sheard (Ersai Construction Manager at Kuryk) came into one of the sessions to lend his support, this really meant a lot to everyone and endorsed our clients support in what we are doing to raise awareness and add more safety leaders to our team to make DSL Caspian and the Kuryk site a safer one.

data.name: SHEQnewsIOSH3
data.value: This is an extremely important part of our strategy to support the joint venture in Kazakhstan by upskilling as many of the team as possible to help DSL Caspian be the safest company in Kazakhstan, Actavo have now trained 39 of our team over the last six months in IOSH Managing Safely.

data.name: SHEQnewsIOSH4
data.value: The energy and enthusiasm demonstrated by the team and their appetite to learn is amazing Neill said, they will be the forefront and leaders going out and applying what they have been taught.

data.name: TeamEventText
data.value: DSL Caspian has held on 12 May teambuilding event between the employees of the Company
